content.calloutQuote: Call out quote. At TSD, we don't shy away from complexity - we embrace it. We thrive on solving the most intricate technical challenges, etc.
content.challenge:
SafeLives, a registered UK charity and a government organisation dedicated to addressing domestic abuse at its core, faced a significant hurdle; their existing Multi-Agency Risk Assessment Conferences (Marac) data platform was built on Drupal 7—an architecture nearing its end-of-life.

The deprecation of Drupal 7 and dependence on their Marac data platform put them under immense pressure to act fast. Adding to this, the existing platform was cumbersome, especially during the critical phase of data validation, causing delays and frustrations for both users and administrators.

aside.title: Ready to Transform Your Digital Capabilities?
aside.content: Experience the TSD difference. Reach out to us today to discuss how we can support your next mission-critical project. Contact Us Today on +44 121 31 45 374 or email clinic@tsd.digital
